title: Makeup-free Rebel Wilson touches down in Sydney wearing a tracksuit and sunglasses
text:
She is one of the most recognisable people in Hollywood.

But on Friday, Australian actress Rebel Wilson seemingly flew under the radar after she made a very low-key arrival at Sydney Airport.

The Pitch Perfect star, 39, was all smiles while walking through the terminal, wearing a casual ensemble consisting of a black T-shirt and tracksuit pants.

Low profile! Australian actress Rebel Wilson (pictured) seemingly flew under the radar after she made a very low-key arrival at Sydney Airport

Rebel covered her eyes with a pair of chic sunglasses and kept things simple by donning a pair of black pointy-toed flats.

She completed her travel look with an oversized green parker and carried a chic cerulean Givenchy tote bag.

Going makeup free, the actress was accompanied by a Qantas employee, who helped her carry her luggage to an awaiting car.

Shady lady! Rebel (pictured) covered her eyes with a glamorous pair of chic sunglasses and kept things simple by donning a pair of black pointy-toed flats

Her low-key arrival comes after it was revealed that she is set to host Channel Seven's new competitive dog styling series, Pooch Perfect, which will air in 2020.

The Bridesmaids star's involvement with the show was previously announced on Seven's The Morning Show in September.

'Award-winning Hollywood actress and former junior dog handler Rebel Wilson will be joining the Channel Seven family,' host Kylie Gillies told audiences.

Casual chic! The Pitch Perfect star, 39, was all smiles as she made her way through the terminal, wearing a casual ensemble, consisting of a black T-shirt and tracksuit pants

Channel Seven's entertainment reporter Peter Ford told Kylie and co-host Larry Emdur that the show will 'mainly focus on the grooming aspect of dogs'.

Ten professional dog stylists will compete in themed challenges for a $10,000 cash prize to be judged by a panel of industry professionals.

Comparing it to 2000 comedy Best In Show, Peter said: 'Of course Rebel will see the funny side of all of this as well as respecting the craft and the art of training and grooming these dogs. So it is a great concept. '
description: Australian actress Rebel Wilson seemingly flew under the radar after she  made a very low-key arrival at Sydney Airport.
authors: Mark Brook For Daily Mail Australia
